entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Post Modest Thanksgiving Gains as Crypto Market Claws Back $12B
entry.summary: Bitcoin and Ethereum both rose several points on Thanksgiving day, as the bearish pressure of FTX's collapse appears to be waning.

entry.title: Singapore Police Probe Hodlnaut for ‘Possible Cheating and Fraud’
entry.summary: Singapore's police received multiple reports between August and November that Holdnaut downplayed exposure to a "certain digital token."

entry.title: Infura Collecting MetaMask Users' IP, Ethereum Addresses After Privacy Policy Update
entry.summary: New updates to ConsenSys' API tool Infura have sparked controversy in the crypto community as it will begin collecting users’ IP addresses.

entry.title: Binance Eyes $1 Billion Raise for Crypto 'Recovery Fund', Could Buy FTX Assets
entry.summary: Binance chief Changpeng Zhao said the fund would initially have $1 billion to buy up distressed assets, but the figure could be increased.

entry.title: 'Avengers' Directors to Bring FTX Miniseries to Amazon
entry.summary: "Avengers: Endgame" directors the Russo brothers will produce a mini-series based on FTX's collapse, with "multiple Marvel actors" in talks to star.

entry.title: Polygon’s ‘Secret Sauce’: Why Starbucks, Meta, and Reddit Chose the Ethereum Scaler
entry.summary: Ryan Wyatt, CEO of Polygon Studios, discusses the recent wave of major Web2 brands building on the platform.

entry.title: Storytelling Plus Technology Equals Freedom: Author Jason Primrose
entry.summary: A panel of futurists sat down at Camp Decrypt to examine the role of storytelling in Web3 and NFTs.

entry.title: NFTs Are Dead? Even in Bear Market, a Bored Ape Sells for Nearly $1 Million
entry.summary: The golden-fur Ethereum NFT sold for 800 ETH, or about $927,000, even as wider Bored Ape Yacht Club prices trend downward.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and Dogecoin Jump on Release of Fed Minutes
entry.summary: Crypto followed U.S. stocks upward Wednesday on signs that the Fed may shift to smaller interest rate hikes.

entry.title: NFT Real-Life Use Cases
entry.summary: NFTs establish digital scarcity and unique, provable identifiers. They indicate which digital asset is the original—like a certified painting in a room full of duplicate prints.

entry.title: Japan Kicks Off Central Bank Digital Currency Experiment
entry.summary: The Nikkei reported Wednesday that the Bank of Japan has started working on a CBDC with three megabanks.

entry.title: How a Tiny Startup Beat Magic Eden and Rarible to Build ApeCoin’s NFT Marketplace
entry.summary: Launched today, the official marketplace offers lower trading fees than most NFT platforms, plus other Bored Ape-centric perks.

entry.title: Elon Musk Calls Report That SBF Invested $100M in Twitter ‘False’
entry.summary: Musk has sought to distance himself from the crypto founder since FTX’s catastrophic collapse this past month.

entry.title: Fenbushi Founder Bo Shen Loses $42M in Stablecoins, Bitcoin, Ethereum to Hackers
entry.summary: Notable Chinese venture investor Bo Shen revealed he lost $42 million worth of crypto as a result of a theft from his personal wallet.

entry.title: Bitcoin Will Become ‘Less Important’ for Cybercrime Payments: Kaspersky
entry.summary: Privacy coins like Monero and Zcash could soon be playing a much larger role in the multibillion-dollar world of cybercrime crypto transfers.

entry.title: New York Signs Two-Year Crypto Mining Moratorium Into Law
entry.summary: New York became the first state to instate a temporary moratorium on new fossil fuel-powered cryptocurrency mining operations.

entry.title: Bitcoin, Ethereum, Dogecoin Muster Thanksgiving Rally as Markets Rebound
entry.summary: Despite the day’s recovery for leading cryptocurrencies, Bitcoin, Ethereum, and Dogecoin are still in the red over the week.

entry.title: FTX Collapse Is 'Not a Crypto Failure,' Says Minnesota Rep. Tom Emmer
entry.summary: The newly appointed majority whip did not mince words when blaming Sam Bankman-Fried and SEC Chair Gary Gensler for the industry's current state.

entry.title: Crypto Paradise? El Salvador Preps New Law To Pave Way for All Crypto
entry.summary: Following its groundbreaking Bitcoin Law, El Salvador is now seeking to court the broader cryptocurrency industry.

entry.title: Mango Market Hacker Loses Millions in Failed Aave Scheme
entry.summary: Avraham Eisenberg, the crypto trader behind last month’s $100 million Mango Markets price manipulation maneuver, couldn’t do the same to Aave.

entry.title: Onchain Data Shows FTX Collapse Was ‘Inevitable’: Report
entry.summary: Blockchain analytics firm Glassnode traced warning signs back to the Terra collapse.

entry.title: Why OpenSea Is Sticking With NFT Creator Royalties
entry.summary: CEO Devin Finzer speaks with Decrypt about royalties moves, the response from creators, and X2Y2 following its lead.

entry.title: Solana Market Cap Shrinks Below Litecoin in Protracted Descent
entry.summary: The one-time Ethereum killer has fallen sharply as the crypto market buckles under the wreckage of FTX.

entry.title: Digital Currency Group Says No Imminent Threat Despite Owing Genesis $575M
entry.summary: DCG CEO Barry Silbert sought to reassure investors today following the collapse of FTX, detailing its intercompany loans with Genesis.

entry.title: Rockstar Games Bans NFTs, Crypto From Grand Theft Auto Fan Servers
entry.summary: Take-Two Interactive is into Web3, but its Rockstar Games studio just put a stop to NFT use in modded Grand Theft Auto V servers.

entry.title: FTX Bankruptcy Hearing: Bahamas Liquidators Transfer Case to Delaware, Creditor Names Remain Redacted
entry.summary: James Bromley, counsel to FTX’s new management, called the bankruptcy "one of the most abrupt and difficult collapses in the history of corporate America."

entry.title: World Cup Shocker Sinks Argentina Football Fan Token
entry.summary: Fans sold off their ARG tokens during Argentina’s upset loss against Saudi Arabia.

entry.title: Are Tom Brady and Larry David Liable for the FTX Disaster?
entry.summary: A class-action lawsuit against FTX also named 11 celebrities who endorsed FTX. But are the endorsers really legally liable for Bankman-Fried’s alleged fraud?

entry.title: Bitpanda Lands Operating License in Germany as Regulators Circle Industry
entry.summary: The demise of the FTX should be “a wake-up call” for the entire industry, according to Bitpanda’s growth lead Magdalena Hoerhager.

entry.title: Magic Eden Eyes Gaming, Brand NFTs With Planned Polygon Support
entry.summary: After expanding to Ethereum, the top Solana marketplace will add Polygon NFTs, citing the sidechain's Web2 partners and gaming potential.

entry.title: Cathie Wood's Ark Invest Scoops Another $1.4M of Grayscale Bitcoin Trust
entry.summary: Ark Invest has made back-to-back investments in Grayscale’s Bitcoin Fund despite the asset’s massive discount.

entry.title: Ethereum Metaverse Game The Sandbox to Launch LAND Sale With Playboy, Tony Hawk, Snoop Dogg
entry.summary: Metaverse game The Sandbox is kicking off a three-part LAND sale this Thursday, partnering with several big-name brands.

entry.title: Bitcoin Price Sinks to Lowest Level in 2 Years
entry.summary: A mixture of high-profile bankruptcy fears, regulatory pressure, and rampant short selling have crushed the price of Bitcoin.

entry.title: Gemini Still Working With Genesis, Digital Currency Group to Unlock Earn User Withdrawals
entry.summary: Gemini said today it's still working on processing redemptions for its Earn product, which is powered by troubled crypto broker Genesis.

entry.title: Binance Cites Conflict of Interest for Passing on Genesis Investment: Report
entry.summary: Crypto broker Genesis Global has reportedly approached Binance for a fresh cash injection, but the crypto exchange decided to pass.

entry.title: Huobi Rebrands, Expands Globally Amid Crypto Industry Challenges
entry.summary: With a more streamlined name, the crypto exchange aims to onboard users from more countries and bring new momentum to the blockchain industry.

entry.title: FTX Bankruptcy Filing: 'No Amounts' Will Be Paid to SBF or His Inner Circle
entry.summary: The wording even specified that nobody with a "familial relationship" with SBF or the recently fired execs would receive payment from FTX.

entry.title: Solana Bear That SBF Dunked On With $3 Offer Gets the Last Laugh
entry.summary: Sam Bankman-Fried offered to buy up all of a trader’s Solana for $3. Now FTX is bankrupt, SBF is out of cash, and SOL is sinking fast.

entry.title: Genesis Trading Warns of Possible Bankruptcy as Post-FTX Fundraising Falters: Report
entry.summary: Having earlier suspended lending services, the crypto giant may be the latest victim of crypto contagion.

entry.title: Coinbase Stock Hits All-Time Low as Bitcoin, Ethereum Decline
entry.summary: The crypto industry is floundering in the aftermath of FTX’s collapse and the broader market downturn.

entry.title: NFT Storytelling: Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry, Artemysia-X, Kas Vegas at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: "Lost Children of Andromeda" author Jason Michael Primrose, Amanda Terry of Metagood and ACTAI Ventures, Artemysia-X of Rug Radio program LorePlay, and Kas Vegas of NFT INT, Huxley, and Feature.io all discussed how their work utilizes NFTs for storytelling, on a lively panel at Camp Decrypt moderated by What's Trending podcast host Shira Lazar.

entry.title: Edward Snowden Talks Tornado Cash Sanctions, Ethereum Merge, DAOs and NFTs at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: In an extensive talk with Decrypt's Dan Roberts at Camp Decrypt in Napa CA in October, Edward Snowden gave his candid views on the Ethereum merge, the sanctioning of Ethereum mixer Tornado Cash by the U.S. government, the privacy shortcomings of Bitcoin and Ethereum, and his view on using DAOs to source tips from whistleblowers.

entry.title: The New Landscape for NFT Drops: Bad Grrls Creative Club, BeetsDAO, and Cymbal at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: Amid a crypto bear market and recent declines in NFT sales volume, what's the new roadmap for new NFT collections? What's expected by community members and collectors? Toni Thai Sterrett of Bad Grrls Creative Club, Jordan Garbis of BeetsDAO, and Eric Feng of NFT block explorer discussed with Decrypt's Kate Irwin at Camp Decrypt Napa.

entry.title: Musician 3LAU on His Music NFT Platform Royal: 'We Take Compliance Really Seriously'
entry.summary: Justin Blau aka 3LAU, CEO of Royal, talks to Decrypt's Kate Irwin about building his company around compliance from the start. "We take compliance so seriously that it might make us move a little bit slower... but we think that's really how we have to build in the space." He also said he looks to Coinbase as a model.

entry.title: FTX Meltdown 101: What the Hell Happened and What Comes Next
entry.summary: In less than a week, one of the largest and most trusted crypto exchanges went up in flames, along with its crypto celebrity founder and CEO Sam Bankman-Fried. Dan Roberts, Stacy Elliott, and Kate Irwin walk you through exactly how it happened, what it means for you, their own takes on the most interesting subplots, and what we can learn from it all. Plus: We review some comments SBF and CZ made on this podcast that look remarkable in hindsight. Watch Episode 23 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.

entry.title: Justin Sun On the Future of Tron's USDD Stablecoin
entry.summary: The Tron founder tells Decrypt about the network's decentralized stablecoin USDD, and how Tron aims to "bridge the Web3 world with the real world.

entry.title: Decrypt Learn: What Is A Blockchain API?
entry.summary: As the unsung heroes of digital connectivity, APIs are the engine under the hood making all the interactivity we’ve come to expect online possible. In video five of the Infura Web3 Dev Series, you’ll learn what blockchain APIs are, how they work, and explore the different types of APIs to improve your dapp’s connectivity. Author: Clarissa Watson, Senior Tech Writer at ConsenSys.

entry.title: When DAOs Meet NFTs: Zora, Chainlink, PubDAO and RugDAO at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: Rug Radio founder Farokh hosted a lively panel at Camp Decrypt Napa on how DAOs are utilizing NFTs, with panelists Lauren Halstead from Chainlink, Tyson Battistella from Zora, Reza Jafery from PubDAO, and Loxley from Rug Radio's associated RugDAO.

entry.title: How Stepn Plans to Keep Running Through the Bear Market
entry.summary: Stepn COO Shiti Manghani speaks to Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Solana Breakpoint in Lisbon to discuss how the move-to-earn app is weathering the bear market, its partnership with sportswear manufacturer Asics, and creator royalties on NFT marketplaces.

entry.title: Brave CEO Brendan Eich: Web3 Isn't Taking Privacy Seriously Enough
entry.summary: Brave founder and CEO Brendan Eich joined Decrypt's Stephen Graves at Web Summit 2022 to discuss how the crypto-powered browser is weathering the bear market—and why Web3 needs to get serious about privacy.

entry.title: The View from Rug Radio: Farokh Speaks at Camp Decrypt 2022
entry.summary: Farokh, founder of the DAO-governed NFT media brand Rug Radio, speaks to Mike Kriak of ConsenSys Mesh at Camp Decrypt: Napa. He talked about Rug Radio's origins, tokenization, sponsorship money during the bear market, and why it's called Rug Radio.

entry.title: gm: Aave Founder Stani Talks Stablecoins and Next Era of DeFi
entry.summary: Aave founder Stani Kulechov joined Dan Roberts and Stacy Elliott to talk about his vision for the next iteration of DeFi, Aave V3 and Lens Protocol, the Web3 company he wishes he had founded, and why now is the right time for the $5B lending protocol to launch its GHO stablecoin. Watch Episode 22 of the gm podcast and make sure to subscribe on Apple or Spotify.
